graduateStudents.about: My research lies at the intersection of Smartphone and IoT Security, Time-series Anomaly Detection, Context-based Security, Air-gap Security, and Physical Signal Encryption.
My research lies at the intersection of analysis of Machine Learning and algorithms and their applications in Recommender Systems and Information Retrieval.

My research lies at the intersection of machine learning and information retrieval. His current research focuses on exploiting Recurrent Neural Networks (RNNs) for building constrained language models.
